'''Liliacruces Ordo''' is a fictional secret society within a literary work that aims to overthrow [[Fontaine]]. The origins of the Liliacruces Ordo can be traced back to the serialized thriller novels "Great Detective Hurlock" published by [[The Steambird]], with its true inspiration drawn from the [[Narzissenkreuz Ordo]]. The '''Liliacruces Forum''' is mentioned by [[Virgil]], and its actual location is within the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]].

===Etymology===
*Liliacruces is made of the Latin words ''{{wt|lilium#Latin|lilia}}'' "lilies" and {{wt|crux#Latin|''cruces''}} "crosses".
